sqlMap.select: SELECT ID,ROLENAME,ZT FROM SOS_SYS_ROLE_INFO WHERE ZT='1' ORDER BY ID

SELECT MENUID FROM SOS_SYS_ROLE_MENU WHERE ROLEID = '$roleId$' AND ZT='1'
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SOS_SYS_ROLE_MENU SET ZT='0' WHERE ROLEID='$roleId$'

INSERT INTO SOS_SYS_ROLE_INFO (ID, ROLENAME, ROLEDESC, CREATOR, CREATEDATE, ZT) VALUES( #maxId#, #roleName#, #roleDesc#, #operator#, sysdate, '1' )
